Corporate News

Maximize the potential of your brand

Communication is powerful. If you know how to use it right, you can influence your surroundings. We have excellent communication skills that will move your company wherever you want. Be better than your competitor. Communicate in alternative ways and increase your chances of organic reach.

  • Next

Your own Magazine

"You will create your brand through your very own magazine. Thanks to interesting content and a strong visual strategy this goal is within reach."

People love magazines. Magazines are personal, visually appealing and offer a unique space to be closer to your customer. You communicate with your clients daily - through promotional materials, advertisements or brochures. How, however, can we draw our clients into deeper content and give them an opinion that is not explicitly promotional?

A company magazine speaks with a publicist voice, which is an interest to the customers - a benefit for you. You will create your brand through your own magazine, thanks to interesting content and a strong visual strategy. We will create a magazine that will appeal to your targeted audience and separate you from your competition. Your Magazine - its content, graphics, printing is provided by our company on the "key". Of course, each of the magazines has its online version.

  • Contact us

About us

"We have embarked on an exciting journey of searching for and discovering a way how to be different, which separates our clients from our competitors."

Be different... These two words were at the beginning of our project and they are still a big challenge for us. We have embarked on an exciting journey of searching for and discovering a way how to be different, which separates our clients from our competitors.

In December 2014, patients at the J. A. Reiman University Hospital in Prešov, the University Hospital in Košice L. Pasteur or NsP Sv. Jakuba, n.o. Bardejov held in their hands the first ever copy of the Hipokrates magazine with the subtitle "You know more about us ..." The aim of the magazine was to introduce the doctors in a different light. Their own personal stories are a way of increasing the patients’ confidence in the doctors. The content of interviews with well-known celebrities also grew.

A year later, in March 2015, Kolonáda magazine became a part of the company's portfolio, which continues to make their guests’ stay in Bardejovské Spa more enjoyable. In collaboration with the company management, we look for and supply themes that complement the brand and exclusivity of Bardejovské Spa.

Connect not only clients but also employees - this was the intention of the SAD Presov news in 2017. SAD Presov magazine wants to make it easier for travellers to work for everyday duties of attractive themes that are close to this target group.

Your own magazine

"No one will take their eyes off Your Own Magazine."

Having your own MAGAZINE is a great way to add finishing touches to the image of your company. Through compelling content, you can get closer to your clients and increase brand awareness. Allow them to look into the "life" of your company and show them why you are good at what you are doing.

Your Magazine will be personalized, visually appealing, and with content tailor to your needs. It will provide a unique space for addressing your customer or your employees. Your magazine will be interesting for everyone. Whether you decide for an online or print version, its content, graphics, prints - everything will be secure by our company.

Having your own MAGAZINE is a way to increase your corporate culture. To further shape and increase company results, communication with employees is essential. Forms of communication may differ.

Internal communication through corporate news is the way you can influence information on your business and processes, and thus the results, through your information. You also support the pride of the employees working in your business. Their social prestige is increasing.

References

Ing. Tamara Šatanková, Business Director BARDEJOVSKÉ KÚPELE a.s.

Kreativita, profesionálny prístup a korektné vzťahy - takto možno charakterizovať spoluprácu so spoločnosťou PrimaDomi. Spolupracovali sme na niekoľkých projektoch nášho interného časopisu Kolonáda, kde sme sa vždy dohodli na zaujímavých témach, ktoré sme starostlivo vyberali tak, aby zaujali čitateľov.

Naozaj nám vždy ušili časopis doslova na mieru, predstavili zaujímavé osobnosti z regiónu a hlavne pristupovali zodpovedne. S ich službami sme nadmieru spokojní a tešíme sa na ďalšie projekty.
